name: AdTruth
tag_list: adtruth, mobile, mobile-marketing, device-recognition, device-identification, privacy, device-imprinting, cookies, performance, analytics, web, desktop, pii, do-not-track, device-fingerprinting, mobile-app-tracking, app-download-tracking
overview: In a world where people are increasingly reliant on a variety of Internet-connected devices for everything from banking to shopping to entertainment and media, creating relevant customer experiences is a constant and complex business challenge. 41st Parameter, the global leader in device recognition and intelligence, combines its patented technologies and years of expertise to identify devices without cookies, without compromising privacy and without impacting performance. AdTruth, the company’s digital media division, gives marketers a new and better way to recognize and reach their most valuable audiences across all types of devices. These privacy compliant solutions help keep the Internet more secure and relevant for everyone. To learn more about digital media solutions from AdTruth visit www.AdTruth.com.

external_links.title: Solving the Audience Recognition Crisis: Achieving the Best of Both Worlds in Performance and Privacy
